description: TrueNAS/FreeNAS dashboard using InfluxDb with graphite endpoint as data source.

targets.query: SELECT last("cpu.system")+ last("cpu.user")+ last("cpu.interrupt") FROM "cpu-average" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.active" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "memory.free" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("temperature") FROM "0" WHERE ("resource" = 'cputemp') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT * FROM "vmx0_if_octets_rx" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.expr: truenas_smart_attributes_sda_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdb_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdc_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdd_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sde_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdf_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdg_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdh_raw_value{name="Total_LBAs_Written"}

truenas_smart_attributes_sda_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdb_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdc_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdd_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sde_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdf_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdg_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"} OR truenas_smart_attributes_sdh_raw_value{name="Host_Writes_GiB"}

title: TrueNAS Dashboard
